INSUFFICENT_PASSWORD_LENGTH_MESSAGE: Password should be at least 6 characters long
NURSE_NOT_AUTHORIZED: Only Billing Manger and Billing Admin has access to web portal
NEW_NOT_EQUAL_CONFIRM: New password and confirm password should be same
INVALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid Email address
NAME_INVALID: Invalid name, apart from alphabets only [space],[dot] and ['] are allowed.
BA_ONLY_AUTHORISED_ASSIGN: Only Billing Admin can assign or unassign requests
FILL_REQUIRED_FIELDS: Please fill all the required fields
PICKUP_DATE_NOT_GIVEN: Please provide pickup date and time
MAX_RANGE: You can only select range upto 3 months.
